## Introduction


```{r import data}
install.packages("foreign")
install.packages("downloader")
install.packages("utils")
install.packages("readr")
library(foreign)
library(downloader)
library(utils)
library(readr)
if(!file.exists("data_gwang37")){
  dir.create("data_gwang37")
}
setwd("./data_gwang37")

fileurl = "ftp://ftp.nhtsa.dot.gov/fars/2015/National/FARS2015NationalCSV.zip"
download.file(fileurl,destfile = "./data_gwang37/FARS2015NationalCSV.zip",method = "curl")
unzip("./data_gwang37/FARS2015NationalCSV.zip")

nmcrash = read_csv("nmcrash.csv")
pbtype = read_csv("pbtype.csv")


```
